hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description: As a software engineer, my technical expertise allows me to translate design visions into functional realities. I am skilled in creating pixel-perfect replicas of Figma designs, ensuring a high level of visual accuracy in my work. Furthermore, I focus on engineering all methods and components in a reusable and efficient manner, promoting maintainable and scalable solutions.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description: I pride myself on being an approachable and collaborative team member, finding it easy to integrate and work effectively with others. I am particularly energized by tackling large and complex projects, where I can contribute meaningfully to significant undertakings and see them through to completion.

bio.title: bio
bio.description: As a passionate computer engineer turned software engineer, I've dedicated my career to blending innovation with functionality, crafting digital solutions that not only meet but exceed expectations. With a keen eye for detail and a penchant for problem-solving, I thrive in dynamic environments where creativity intersects with technical expertise.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: My interests include continuously exploring new technologies and engaging in creative project development.

education.title: education
education.description: I studied Computer Engineering, but honestly, I was always way more into the software and programming side of things. That's where my real passion lies!

sports.title: sports
sports.description: My interests extend beyond the screen and into the physical realm. I'm passionate about staying active and find joy in several sports: from exploring scenic trails through hiking, to pushing my physical limits with bodybuilding, enjoying the open road through cycling, and finding a refreshing workout in swimming.

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description:

Call of Duty
Counter-Strike
